metadata.title: CVE-2022-3303 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
A race condition flaw was found in the Linux kernel sound subsystem due toimproper locking. It could lead to a NULL pointer dereference whilehandling the SNDCTL_DSP_SYNC ioctl. A privileged local user (root or memberof the audio group) could use this flaw to crash the system, resulting in adenial of service condition

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-3303` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-214-generic - 4.15.0-214.225
linux-image-4.15.0-214-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-214.225
linux-image-4.15.0-214-lowlatency - 4.15.0-214.225
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-214-generic - 4.15.0-214.225
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-214-lowlatency - 4.15.0-214.225
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1159-aws - 4.15.0-1159.172
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1093-aws - 5.4.0-1093.102~18.04.2
No subscription required
